paper.title: Test Generation for Intelligent Networks Using Model Checking
paper.venue: Tools and Algorithms for Construction and Analysis of Systems
paper.abstract: We study the use of model checking techniques for the generation of test sequences. Given a formal model of the system to be tested, one can formulate test purposes. A model checker then derives test sequences that fulfill these test purposes. The method is demonstrated by applying it to a specification of an Intelligent Network with two features.
